org.crz.db.query

Class SQLQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.crz.db.query.SQLQuery

  • public class SQLQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that has standard functionality of CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete).
